title: Awesome List Updates on Mar 11, 2019
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Mar 11, 2019 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Cmake
items.content_text:
### Examples / Templates

*   [cmake-examples (⭐1.2k)](https://github.com/pr0g/cmake-examples) - A collection of as simple as possible, modern CMake projects. [`[MIT]`](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)
items.content_html:
Examples / Templates

  • cmake-examples (⭐1.2k) - A collection of as simple as possible, modern CMake projects. [MIT]

items.title: Terminals Are Sexy
items.content_text:
### Tools and Plugins

*   [nnn (⭐20k)](https://github.com/jarun/nnn) - Tiny, lightning fast, feature-packed file manager.
*   [tiv (⭐1.6k)](https://github.com/stefanhaustein/TerminalImageViewer) - Text mode terminal image viewer.
items.content_html:
Tools and Plugins

  • nnn (⭐20k) - Tiny, lightning fast, feature-packed file manager.
  • tiv (⭐1.6k) - Text mode terminal image viewer.

items.title: Awesome Jupyter
items.content_text:
### Runtimes/Frontends

*   [JupyterWith (⭐717)](https://github.com/tweag/jupyterWith) - Nix-based framework for the definition of declarative and reproducible Jupyter environments.
items.content_html:
Runtimes/Frontends

  • JupyterWith (⭐717) - Nix-based framework for the definition of declarative and reproducible Jupyter environments.

items.title: Awesome Cybersecurity Blueteam
items.content_text:
### Windows-based defenses / Overlay and Virtual Private Networks (VPNs)

*   [Sigcheck](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/sysinternals/downloads/sigcheck) - Audit a Windows host's root certificate store against Microsoft's [Certificate Trust List (CTL)](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/desktop/SecCrypto/certificate-trust-list-overview).
items.content_html:
Windows-based defenses / Overlay and Virtual Private Networks (VPNs)

  • Sigcheck - Audit a Windows host's root certificate store against Microsoft's Certificate Trust List (CTL).

items.title: Awesome Pentest
items.content_text:
### Reverse Engineering / Reverse Engineering Tools

*   [Ghidra](https://www.ghidra-sre.org/) - Suite of free software reverse engineering tools developed by NSA's Research Directorate originally exposed in WikiLeaks's "Vault 7" publication and now maintained as open source software.
items.content_html:
Reverse Engineering / Reverse Engineering Tools

  • Ghidra - Suite of free software reverse engineering tools developed by NSA's Research Directorate originally exposed in WikiLeaks's "Vault 7" publication and now maintained as open source software.

items.title: Awesome Flutter
items.content_text:
### Utilities / Game Engine resources

*   [FVM (⭐5.1k)](https://github.com/leoafarias/fvm) <!--stargazers:leoafarias/fvm--> - Flutter Version Management: A simple cli to manage Flutter SDK versions.
items.content_html:
Utilities / Game Engine resources

  • FVM (⭐5.1k) - Flutter Version Management: A simple cli to manage Flutter SDK versions.

items.title: Awesome Iot
items.content_text:
### Software / Libraries and Tools

*   [MQTT Explorer](https://thomasnordquist.github.io/MQTT-Explorer/) - Tool to visualize your MQTT topics in a topic hierarchy, a MQTT swiss-army knife.
items.content_html:
Software / Libraries and Tools

  • MQTT Explorer - Tool to visualize your MQTT topics in a topic hierarchy, a MQTT swiss-army knife.

items.title: Awesome Java
items.content_text:
### People / Socials

*   [Sander Mak](https://twitter.com/Sander_Mak) - Java Champion, author.
items.content_html:
People / Socials

  • Sander Mak - Java Champion, author.

items.title: Awesome Broadcasting
items.content_text:
### Animation, Graphics & Video Playout

*   [Sofie - TV Automation (⭐395)](https://github.com/nrkno/Sofie-TV-automation) - MOS-driven automation system for news casts, with many libraries for e.g. device control.

### Monitoring & Quality Control

*   [Pi Audio Monitor (⭐163)](https://github.com/martim01/pam) - Audio Monitoring for Raspberry Pi, supports S/PDIF, AES3, AES67, Livewire and Ravenna.
items.content_html:
Animation, Graphics & Video Playout

  • Sofie - TV Automation (⭐395) - MOS-driven automation system for news casts, with many libraries for e.g. device control.

Monitoring & Quality Control

  • Pi Audio Monitor (⭐163) - Audio Monitoring for Raspberry Pi, supports S/PDIF, AES3, AES67, Livewire and Ravenna.

items.title: Awesome Npm
items.content_text:
### Web

*   [ghub.io](https://ghub.io) - Redirects to the GitHub repo of an npm package.

### Community / `pre` and `post` scripts

*   [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/npm)
*   [Blog](https://blog.npmjs.org)
items.content_html:
Web

  • ghub.io - Redirects to the GitHub repo of an npm package.

Community / pre and post scripts

  • Stack Overflow
  • Blog

items.title: Awesome Appium
items.content_text:
### Become an Appium Pro

*   [How to Determine Element Locators For Mobile Web and Hybrid Apps](https://appiumpro.com/editions/57)
*   [How to Test on Headless Emulators and Simulators with Appium](https://appiumpro.com/editions/58)
*   [How to Automate Picker Wheel Controls](https://appiumpro.com/editions/59)
items.content_html:
Become an Appium Pro

  • How to Determine Element Locators For Mobile Web and Hybrid Apps
  • How to Test on Headless Emulators and Simulators with Appium
  • How to Automate Picker Wheel Controls
